me... it's for my master Darkfate... He hears that you don't get 
along with alliance and  he send me to find out if that information 
its true"

> ::KitKat::
> 
> She nodded and watched the rest of the leave. She left the room and 
> walked down the hall She saw Diamond standing in the 
> doorway. "Hello,"  She walked in past Diamond and looked at

> KitKat. How can I be of service to you?"
